lenders.occupational_info: I am a plumber. I repair and install anything to do with water and sewer systems.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the microloan concept and favour no or very low interest lending.  The less Government intervention to the transfer of credit the better as far as I am concerned. To many big hogs have their snouts in the trough in these poor countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and actually think that our bank created credit system of finance must eventually collapse.  The recent '07 - '08 crisis is a warning of that collapse.  Our collective wealth(?) is all smoke and mirrors.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a deserving person the opportunity to succeed just as someone gave me that opportunity. lenders.occupational_info: I am an involved grandma, volunteer in my community and find it personally rewarding to do for others.

lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I consider myself extremely fortunate and truly blessed.  Although I am not a wealthy individual, I do look for ways to help whenever and however possible. Anyone wishing to correspond, feel free to email me at "cturner25@triad.rr.com."
lenders.occupational_info: As the Director for Research Administration in the Department of Pharmacology at UNC-CH, I work as a member of a highly trained team to effectively manage federal, state and private sponsored research programs.  The department's primary mission is 1) to educate and train scientists and physicians in the discipline of pharmacology for the challenges of today and tomorrow, 2) to make discoveries in research that are relevant to medicine and the basic mechanisms underlying the causes of human disease, 3) to work with other scientists and physicians in an interdisciplinary approach to translate basic discovery into new treatments and cures of human disease.

There are many organizations that profess to help the poor, but much of the money is used up in administrative or other costs and does not reach the people in need.  Kiva seems like a way to help those in need more directly with more of the money, and in a way that is self sustaining.

lenders.loan_because: because I am able and it is a wonderful opportunity to help someone
lenders.occupational_info: I make fused glass jewelry and wall art by cutting the glass, designing and then firing it in a kiln

lenders.name: toni
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a positive role model for my daughter by showing her that compassion and caring can go a long way.

lenders.name: Tiago
lenders.occupational_info: Working in malaria drug resistance

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: jodi
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is an excellent way to help someone declare their independence.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving back.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for people who have a lot of money to invest (I'm not one of them), and my job is to make sure their investments are as safe and risk-free as they can be.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: These people need so little to be very successful, productive and hard-working

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that giving charity without empowerment merely disables those less fortunate than I am, fostering dependence and maintaining an unnecessary, unGodly distance between people .
lenders.occupational_info: I help people improve their written communication skills, and create moving words for my own readers.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: John & Tina
lenders.loan_because: Because Kiva loans fortify the vision that the world is truly a single community and family.

lenders.name: Dick & Jackie
lenders.loan_because: To help people
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are retired and enjoy genealogy, birding and travel.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: During the day I help run a medical device manufacturing company. At night I help take care of my family.

lenders.name: joao
lenders.loan_because: I like to see honest hard working people flourish. If they need financial support to upgrade or to start their business it is my pleasure to help them.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly commercial jet airplanes carrying passengers from one location to another. I provide transportation  for people to reach the place they need to go in less time and in a comfortable manner.

lenders.name: Owen
lenders.loan_because: It is something I want to do to help and think it is important to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sixth grade student in the United States. My Mom is from Chicago, IL and my Dad grew up in Indonesia.

lenders.name: Gisela
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: research in international economics

lenders.name: Faith
lenders.loan_because: It is such a great way to have a direct impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people cope with the stress filled times they encounter in their life.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have  many wonderful people lend me a hand as I've made my way through school and started my career. I am lending in honor of all the generous people who have touched my life.

lenders.name: Klaas
lenders.loan_because: payable credit is the best remedy against poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Software Engineer

lenders.name: Berber
lenders.loan_because:
I was lucky to be born in the Netherlands. I had the opportunity to take a good education and get a job I enjoy doing. 
I know I can't change everything that is wrong in this world, but I can make an effort to do what I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a bank.

lenders.name: Annette
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering others to do what they enjoy.
lenders.occupational_info: My hobby, free time and most of my  money is spent on photography, which I love. I enjoy the manual processes of using film and developing in the darkroom, as well as digital photography and computer-assisted editing.

lenders.name: Cary
lenders.loan_because: I want to see others succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I started and now run a successful construction company.

lenders.name: Sheryl
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed my life and I believe I am called to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small and medium sized companies export their products to international markets.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: we are called to think about more than just ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Finance

lenders.name: Blake
lenders.loan_because: A lot of people don't like Americans, but, if you give those people money, their feelings usually change.
lenders.occupational_info: Just keeping it real, which translates in all languages.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed to have a good job and a healthy family and I like to share my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Karen,Dave & Amellia
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to help someone!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with families who want to adopt or foster children in need.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because:
I feel it is important to give back. I am very blessed - I have an amazing family and truly great friends.
I also feel that self reliance is so important. If I can be contribute to someone's independence than I feel its been a great day.
lenders.occupational_info: Education related work that brings ease, joy and love into people's lives with kids.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is a deep passion within.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in sales finding new clients for a catering and event planning company. We provide breakfast, lunch and dinner to business.  We create parties for clients ranging between 20 guests to 25,000 guests.

lenders.name: Marguerite
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea
lenders.occupational_info: Process payments and invoices from Customers/Vendors.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I live part-time in Guatemala, and I see the impact even small amounts of money (by U.S. middle-class standards) can have on individual lives.  The Kiva microloans connect me to others in the world in a meaningful way.  It's the heart in action!
lenders.occupational_info: I have been an arts and entertainment journalist and a TV-documentary producer; I am currently at work on an experimental novel. And in my business as The wordARTist, I use my writing and editing skills to build powerful word-bridges connecting artists to their audiences--anywhere in the world.

lenders.name: Rachel and Bruce
lenders.occupation: owners of  small, rural animal hospital
lenders.loan_because: We, every one of us, can create the kind of world in which we want to live. We choose to give until there is no need...

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer at the local hospital and I am a breast cancer survivor.

lenders.name: Henrique & Family
lenders.loan_because: I should and it's a better way to help
lenders.occupational_info: I design usable IT systems, I design productive and human work environments and structures and I help organisations with strategic thinking and innovative development

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I'm interested in the effects of microlending
lenders.occupational_info: Serial entrepeneur

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part to decrease the North-South gap.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: Money is energy. What goes around comes around.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently teaching English to elementary-middle school students in South Korea.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have the things I desire in life and now I am able to give back and help others do the same.

lenders.name: Preeti
lenders.loan_because: we must work together to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed by all the opportunities my education has allowed me, and want to help others get off the ground .
lenders.occupational_info: I work with club sport athletes at a university in a recreation center.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because:
Lear: You see how this world goes?
Gloucester: I see it feelingly.
lenders.occupational_info: Taught writing, literature and photography for 35 years.

lenders.name: Tim & Susan
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed and there is so much need throughout the world.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: every small amount counts..

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: it's good to help others.  Simple as that.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a graphic designer for a large company.

I also perform stand up comedy at night for fun.

lenders.name: Lending Hands
lenders.occupation: Group of Concerned Friends in Tallahassee, FL
lenders.loan_because: as a group, we want to help others in need. Lending also joins us in friendship and spirit. We felt we could do more together than individually.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of friends who met through church and work. We mostly are in helping professions.

lenders.name: Helene
lenders.loan_because: In our family, we believe in helping others help themselves. My children have chosen the busineses to which they want to make loans, and they have contributed their own money towards that end.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical social worker who helps patients and their families cope with illnesses while in the hospital.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It sure would be a warm fuzzy to know someone else may receive something that will change their life for the better forever. No one person should have to struggle just to survive.
lenders.occupational_info: I represent Celebrity Talent.

lenders.name: English Class
lenders.loan_because: We have much and want to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Unique and Plentiful... we are students working toward Bachelor Degrees in various subjects!

lenders.name: Stephanie en Rutger
lenders.loan_because: to be independent and selfsufficient
lenders.occupational_info: out of the heart

lenders.name: the Borneman Family
lenders.loan_because: To show our kids how simple it can be to touch someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the mother of two boys ages 8 and 9.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I think the best way to combat poverty is to supply people with the tools and resources they need to help themselves. These loans help people become self-sufficient, and I think that is a priceless gift.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a full time student

lenders.name: william
lenders.loan_because: Relatively small loans can be literally life changing for an extraordinary number of people.  How cool is that?  Go, KIVA Go!
lenders.occupational_info: My company installs exterior storm shutters to protect people's homes in the event of hurricanes and other storms.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with financial stability in my own life and I hope to spread this good fortune to as many people as I can in my lifetime.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studing international development and business.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: by doing this small thing, I can be part of a big positive change.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance in life. As a community, we must help each other to become better people and enrich our lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an engineer in building airplanes for The Boeing company.

lenders.name: Meghan
lenders.loan_because: Because everything is better when it's shared.

lenders.name: Sanderson Family
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed with a caring family and want to share our good fortune with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Our farm grows corn, wheat, soybeans and sunflowers.  We all have various careers.

lenders.name: Julianne
lenders.occupational_info: I am learning how to create solutions to problems through making objects, systems or services.

lenders.name: Chase
lenders.loan_because: I generally consider myself a charitable person, but I don't like giving things to people who haven't earned them. Kiva allows me to remain true to my personal principles while empowering individuals in developing countries to create change in themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I study at Claremont McKenna College, a small liberal arts school in Southern California.

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans empower people, particularly women and entire communities by extension. These loans support entrepreneurship, alleviate poverty and restore dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a cook by trade and at present  run my own chai business out of my home in Vermont

lenders.name: Helder
lenders.loan_because: I think that instead of subsiding,  we have to fight poverty with initiative. Together we are more, we are stronger.
lenders.occupational_info: Well... a guy who likes share knowledge. Higher education in IT applications on Chemical Engineering Problems. As a teacher, since I like sharing knowledge... you know, sharing is about giving along while you receive. Right?

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel so good I almost feel guilty - I can't think of anything with such a return for so little effort.
lenders.occupational_info: I write short stories, novels and movies.

lenders.name: Hunter & Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: we can't move a mountain but we cn help push.
lenders.occupational_info: Map making & Conservation

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get stronger after they hurt themselves

lenders.name: Milton
lenders.loan_because: My contribution to small businesses may have a significant impact on the lives of many

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: helping those in need brings warmth to myself and a future for those who need it more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: there is nothing better than giving back, and helping others find their dream home is extremely fulfilling.

lenders.name: KdgnCivicHouseASP
lenders.loan_because: Service Learning Project
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher

lenders.name: David and Valerie
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help others and it is the right thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info:
As a social worker, I help abused and neglected children to learn to be positive, overcome challenges and to free themselves from the pain they have experienced.
Valerie as a teacher promotes among children positive attitude and a good self-esteem.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: We believe people will pay back the loans and grow their businesses even more because of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. Defense Department building radars

lenders.name: sharad pawar
lenders.loan_because: I believe that business is one of the strongest ways to enable social change.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: I am on the board of Micro Business Development, a large microlender in Denver, and through this experience I have come to realize the power of microfinance and believe wholeheartedly that it is one of the best tools we have to change the world for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in the buying and selling of assets for a large media and communications company.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because:
I lost my son in 2005, he was only 23 yo and this is something that I do in memory of him. He was always concerned for those less fortunate, loved the underdog so i think he would approve!
Update Dec 2011 Mum passed away a week before Christmas and so I added some loans in her honour -  clothing and jewellery, her favourite things!

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.loan_because: it's a way to make my donations go much further - a good way for anyone who wants to help but can't spare much.  And it helps people become self-sufficient - the more people we can raise out of critical need, the more there is to go around when a need arises.

lenders.name: Waddah
lenders.loan_because: As a human, I feel that I am obligated to help my follow human being; who needs my help in time of need.
lenders.occupational_info: I would like not  to comment on this question. Thanks

lenders.name: Gita and Sonny
lenders.loan_because: We believe in sustainable development by empowering people to move out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Empowerment.

lenders.name: Joni
lenders.loan_because: One person can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: General merchandise wholesale business

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: personal success is empowering
lenders.occupational_info: I study economics and international finance

lenders.name: craig
lenders.loan_because: taken a gamble and invested their time and money in me and my personal dreams. I am willing to do the same through Kiva because I understand just important it is to know that others believe in you and your personal goals.   I also think that in a global community it's important to help your neighbors- even if they reside behind another border. Thank you Kiva for giving me the opportunity to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a working artist and student of the humanities

lenders.name: Sally-Ann
lenders.loan_because: it seems like such a small thing to do, yet it helps someone lift themselves out of poverty
lenders.occupational_info: Creative Director for a marketing and retail promotions company

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference in someones life.

lenders.name: craig
lenders.loan_because: I think there is a need to let the world know all Americans aren't self centered.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a carpenter.

lenders.name: Bev
lenders.loan_because: I hope my little bit of money will make a  big difference in the life of someone who is probably working very hard.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am retired from my job as a newspaper reporter but continue working as a volunteer. 
My husband and I raised our  four children on a dairy farm. I am now a widow with five grandchildren and live alone with my dog, Kita.

lenders.name: Vlad
lenders.loan_because: I'm a business owner in Massachusetts.  I know how it is to have an idea and not have the funds for it just when you need it the most.  It's funny how the banks won't give money to those that need it the most, but it is available to those who have plenty.  So why not help those people that banks refuse.    =)
lenders.occupational_info: An internet marketing business concentrating on home improvement leads.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: there but for the grace of god, go I
lenders.occupational_info: I pay my bills as a graphic designer; I pay my soul by creating jewelry.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a Junior High School as the technology specialist taking care of computers and classroom technology.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: All of our brothers and sisters around the world should have the privlage of living a decent life.
lenders.occupational_info: environment, health, and safety

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: My life has been extraordinarily blessed and through Kiva, I hope to share what wealth I can with those making an effort to improve their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage work across multiple businesses.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I work in Latin America and see what a difference a little money can make. Just the cost of a couple weeks worth of lattes can make huge difference to people elsewhere.

lenders.name: Jeraldeen
lenders.loan_because: To make the world a better place - one step at a time.

lenders.name: Murf
lenders.loan_because: It is easy and I do so little and I think it means a lot to the borrower.
lenders.occupational_info: techy

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: My mother and I were very poor
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people make money

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: it is the best possible solution to poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student, I study at a university.

lenders.name: Tasha
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone deserves a chance to achieve a goal they set in their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people learn about money management so they can achieve (or maintain) financial independence.

lenders.name: Charles & Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance to succeed. Sometimes it just takes the faith of a stranger turned friend!
lenders.occupational_info: I mix medicines that help sick people feel better.

lenders.name: C.K. Sidhu
lenders.loan_because: It all adds up.

lenders.name: Roy W.
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others realize their dreams of expanding or starting a small business. Kiva provides a realistic opportunity to make this happen and a certain level of confidence for the participants.
lenders.occupational_info: I love working on challenges that are computer related. I am unsure what I would do if they were not around...maybe a mechanic like my father. I have always liked to troubleshoot things.

lenders.name: Frank and Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do...

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: The lines on the map aren't real.  We are all one on our journey on this planet.  My goal is to make a loan in every country.

lenders.name: drgeff
lenders.loan_because: give give give in anyway possible
lenders.occupational_info: Clinical Psychologist providing free therapy for gambling addiction in los angeles
